.cd-decision {
	padding: 14px;
	margin: 2em 0 1em 0;
	display: block;
	position:relative;
	clear:both;
	background-color: #e9e9ee;
}
.cd-decision:before {
	position: absolute;
	font-size: 1.8em;
	font-family: "fontawesome";
	left: 8px;
}
.cd-decision::before {
	content: "\f058";
	color: #94c11f;
}
.cd-decision p {
	margin-left: 2em;
	font-weight: bold;
}
